Rock Lee performs a technique similar to the [[Heavenly Foot of Pain]], but without any chakra enhancement, to deliver a heel drop to the opponent using only sheer physical strength that causes small alteration to the ground on impact.

[[es:Daño del Destello de la Hoja]]
